product_name: Castelli Brillante Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Thanks to soft fabric and seamless construction, the Castelli Brillante women's bike jersey provides ultimate next-to-skin comfort plus lightweight coverage that's perfect for cool-weather rides. Soft, breathable polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping your skin cool and dry even when you start to sweat. Full-length front zipper allows immediate ventilation and easy on/off. Zippered side pocket easily holds ID, keys, or energy gel. Castelli Brillante women's bike jersey features a slim fit that hugs your body without being too tight. Closeout.
short_description: Thanks to soft fabric and seamless construction, the Castelli Brillante women's bike jersey provides ultimate next-to-skin comfort plus lightweight coverage that's perfect for cool-weather rides.
